H0.text: The ‘La Scala Opera House’ is in which European city. Rome

H1.text: The ‘La Scala Opera House’ is in which European city. Vienna

H3.text: The ‘La Scala Opera House’ is in which European city. Milan

A4.text: La Scala is a historic opera house in Milan, Italy.
